DesiVPS Returns with Cool Bonuses for LEB Readers! (LA or NL, 2GB from $3/mo, Free Backups or Snapshots!)

desivps, exclusive, kvm, los angeles, netherlands October 6, 2020 @ 12:00 am, by raindog308

DesiVPS has returned with a special offer in their new location in The Hague, Netherlands.  They’re offering service in Los Angeles as well.  We’ve featured them before, going back to August of 2019.  Their previous offers were based in Los Angeles but now they’ve added a location in Europe.

DesiVPS promises a 30-minute guaranteed response time for all support tickets.  That’s pretty impressive, especially at this price range.  They’re not just a one-trick-pony either, as they offer some interesting unusual services.  First they have resource pools, where you buy a set of resources and carve them up as you wish.  They also offer hybrid servers, which are VMs with dedicated resources.  They round out their product line with the more familiar mix of OpenVZ, KVM, and Dedicated Servers.

Here’s a neat thing for LEB readers: they provide free monthly backups or one VPS snapshot per month.  Open a ticket to claim it.  Nice!

You can read their ToS/Legal Docs here. Payment methods accepted are all major credit cards via PayPal, cryptocurrency, Alipay.

Here’s what they had to say in their own words: 

“DesiVPS is based in Mumbai with servers hosted in Las Angeles. We don’t lease servers, we buy our own server hardware and co-locate them on various networks. To stand out in the IT industry compared to the many competitors, we rely above all on excellent customer service. From our headquarters in Mumbai, our experts will assist you with all matters relating to servers.

We have always tried to use the most modern technology available. We are among the few who do weekly backups of all customer data.

Therefore, if you are looking for VPS hosting for the site, at the same time reliable and for reasonable money – order from us.”
